doesNotHaveAccess: does not grant access to the features available on this page. Upgrade now to unlock exclusive features and advanced tools.

archivedData.noArchivedData: You currently have no archived data.
archivedData.dataSummaryTitle: Your subscription has been adjusted to the '{{planName}}' plan.
archivedData.dataSummaryDescription: Certain features of your previous plan exceeded the limits of your current '{{planName}}' plan. As a result, some of your data has been archived to maintain compliance with the plan's features. You can upgrade your subscription at any time to restore access to your archived data and fully manage it again.

basic-plan.title: Basic plan
basic-plan.description: Ideal for starting out with meal planning and basic client management.

pro-plan.title: Pro plan
pro-plan.description: Designed for professionals seeking advanced meal planning and client management tools.

premium-plan.title: Premium plan
premium-plan.description: Perfect for medium-sized businesses requiring unlimited functionality and personalized support.

ingredients_limit.title: Ingredients Limit
ingredients_limit.description: You can add up to a specific number of ingredients depending on your plan.

meals_limit.title: Meals Limit
meals_limit.description: You can create up to a specific number of meals depending on your plan.

meal_week_types_limit.title: Weekly Meal Plan Types Limit
meal_week_types_limit.description: You can create a specific number of different weekly meal plan types depending on your plan.

clients_limit.title: Clients Limit
clients_limit.description: You can manage up to a specific number of clients depending on your plan.

ai_search.title: AI Search for Ingredients
ai_search.description: Automated AI-powered assistance for ingredient searching.

business_page.title: Business Page
business_page.description: A private page designed to showcase your weekly meal plans.

client_request_form.title: Individual Request Forms
client_request_form.description: Create and send individual request forms to your clients.

order_management.title: Order Management
order_management.description: Manage orders based on your plan. Higher plans offer more features.

weekly_reports.title: Weekly Reports
weekly_reports.description: Automatically generated weekly reports for your clients.

messages.upgradeToEnjoyFeatures: Upgrade now to continue enjoying premium features!
messages.yourFreeTrialCancelled: Your free trial has been canceled and will remain active until the end of the current billing period. You will lose access after
messages.renewSubscription: Renew your plan to continue enjoying premium features.
messages.incompleteMessage: Your subscription process is incomplete. Please complete your payment to activate your plan and gain access to all features.
messages.icompleteExpiredMessage: Your last payment failed, which resulted in the cancellation of your subscription. Select a new plan to regain access to all features.
messages.pastDueMessage: Your payment is past due. Please update your payment method to avoid service disruption and continue enjoying your subscription.
messages.canceledSubscriptionMessage: Your subscription has been canceled and will remain active until the end of the current billing period. You will lose access after
